author: Michelle L. Price
title: Steve Sisolak, Nevada governor, bans malaria drugs for coronavirus patients - Washington Times
description: Steve Sisolak, Nevada governor, bans malaria drugs for coronavirus patients Washington Times Fearing coronavirus, Arizona man dies after taking a form of chloroquine used to treat aquariums CNN He is not Dr. Donald Trump. Ignore the president's medical assert…
content:
LAS VEGAS — Nevada’s governor has signed an emergency order barring the use of anti-malaria drugs for someone who has the coronavirus.
Democratic Gov. Steve Sisolak’s order Tuesday restricting chloroquine and hydroxychloroquine comes after President Donald T… [+969 chars]
